alert.note: Alert for Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:32AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Murray, southeastern Whitfield, southeastern Walker and northwestern Gordon Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 931 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Tilton, or near Dalton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Chatsworth, Resaca, Ramhurst, Redbud, Tilton, Audubon, Mill Creek, Dawnville, Fort Mountain State Park, Nickelsville and North Georgia Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
